div.div:
Welcome to one of the finest schools in the State of Texas.
Thank you for taking the time to find out more about our school and the many excellent programs we have available for our students. Smyer ISD is a wonderful place to educate a child. This environment is made possible by the tremendous parent and community support for our schools, as well as by a hardworking and dedicated staff.

div.div: Due to the large number of requests, pictures from the website slideshows can now be purchased. Use the link above to view the slideshows. The pictures canl be printed $2 for a 4X6, $5 for a 5X7, and $7.50 for an 8X10. The proceeds go to The Pride, Smyer yearbook. Please allow up to two weeks for delivery. No pictures will be sent via email, only printed pictures. Send an email with picture information to Belinda Maye. Orders will not be processed until payment is received. Make checks out to Smyer ISD. Return money to Mrs. Maye in the high school or mail in payment to: Smyer High School Attn. Belinda Maye P.O. Box 206 Smyer, TX 79367

p.br: The mission of the Smyer Independent School District is to provide a diversified system characterized by quality, equity, character, and accountability. All students will acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to be productive members of a global world.
